darkhistory.electrons.ics.BE_integrals

«  darkhistory.electrons.ics   ::   Contents   ::   darkhistory.electrons.ics.BE_integrals.F0  »

darkhistory.electrons.ics.BE_integrals¶

Integrals over the Bose-Einstein distribution.

Functions

F0(a, b[, epsrel]) Definite integral of 1/[(exp(x) - 1)].
F1(a, b[, epsrel]) Definite integral of x/[(exp(x) - 1)].
F2(a, b[, tol]) Definite integral of x^2/[(exp(x) - 1)]
F_inv(a, b[, tol]) Definite integral of (1/x)/(exp(x) - 1).
F_inv_3(a, b[, tol]) Definite integral of (1/x**3)/(exp(x) - 1).
F_inv_5(a, b[, tol]) Definite integral of (1/x**5)/(exp(x) - 1).
F_inv_a(lowlim, a[, tol]) Integral of 1/((x+a)(exp(x) - 1)) from lowlim to infinity.
F_inv_n(a, b, n[, tol]) Definite integral of (1/x**n)/(exp(x) - 1)
F_log(a, b[, tol]) Definite integral of log(x)/(exp(x) - 1).
F_log_a(lowlim, a[, tol]) Integral of log(x+a)/(exp(x) - 1) from lowlim to infinity.
F_x_log(a, b[, tol]) Definite integral of x log(x)/(exp(x) - 1).
F_x_log_a(lowlim, a[, tol]) Integral of x log (x+a)/(exp(x) - 1) from lowlim to infinity.
